content.rendered:
Brokers & Facilities Services

Make sure your clients get the service they need, while improving their sustainability practices with waste meteringTM technology.

Brokers & Facilities Services

Make sure your clients get the service they need, while improving their sustainability practices with waste meteringTM technology.

Welcome to Waste MeteringTM

  • Cut hauling costs
  • Continuously rightsize service levels to match actual client needs
  • Reduce client spend by 30%+ and eliminate contamination fines
  • Be the sustainability partner of choice
  • Support carbon neutrality goals by reducing truck miles traveled
  • Use data-driven education to help your clients meet Zero Waste goals
  • Hold haulers accountable
  • Proactively identify missed pickups
  • Use image-based data to resolve service and billing disputes

Trusted by the Best

Saving $6.2 million for QSR clients

Global Trash Solutions

GTS is delivering $6.2 million in savings to clients like McDonald’s, Wendy’s, Burger King and Taco Bell using waste metering™ technology, translating to $1,700 in savings per dumpster per year. At the same time, waste metering helps GTS clients meet and exceed their recycling and carbon footprint reduction goals.
See more customer stories

The ultimate hauler accountability and customer education tool

Automated Rightsizing

Schedule for what’s needed

Waste metering technology automatically identifies what service schedule, dumpster size and dumpster type your clients actually need for each site, ensuring you’re always paying the lowest amount possible for actual collection needs. The average Compology client saves $1,800 per dumpster per year, or about 30% of waste collection costs.

Explore automated rightsizing

Automated Rightsizing

Schedule for what’s needed

Waste metering technology automatically identifies what service schedule, dumpster size and dumpster type your clients actually need for each site, ensuring you’re always paying the lowest amount possible for actual collection needs. The average Compology client saves $1,800 per dumpster per year, or about 30% of waste collection costs.

Explore automated rightsizing

Hauler Partnership

VERIFY SERVICE EVENTS AND IDENTIFY SERVICE TREND CHANGES

Verifiable data and images let you understand if your client’s service levels are being met according to contracts in place, and partner with your haulers to regularly review service schedules based on actual waste outputs.

Hauler Partnership

VERIFY SERVICE EVENTS AND IDENTIFY SERVICE TREND CHANGES

Verifiable data and images let you understand if your client’s service levels are being met according to contracts in place, and partner with your haulers to regularly review service schedules based on actual waste outputs.

Contamination Reduction

Avoid fines and improve diversion practices

Our AI-powered waste metering technology automatically scans images to identify 6+ categories of contamination. Through email alerts, text alerts and reporting, we educate you and your clients on which material should go in each bin to avoid fines and improve recycling practices and diversion from landfill.

Explore contamination reduction

Contamination Reduction

Avoid fines and improve diversion practices

Our AI-powered waste metering technology automatically scans images to identify 6+ categories of contamination. Through email alerts, text alerts and reporting, we educate you and your clients on which material should go in each bin to avoid fines and improve recycling practices and diversion from landfill.

Explore contamination reduction

Sustainability & ESG

ACHIEVE CARBON NEUTRALITY AND ZERO WASTE GOALS

Waste metering technology enables you and your clients to produce cleaner recycling streams and divert more contaminated material from landfills. Accurate measurement lets you take action to reduce carbon impact over time, doing your part to tackle climate change and reduce natural resource consumption. Automated reporting helps your clients deliver informative CSR reports to stakeholders and build a cleaner, greener community.

Explore sustainability

Sustainability & ESG

ACHIEVE CARBON NEUTRALITY AND ZERO WASTE GOALS

Waste metering technology enables you and your clients to produce cleaner recycling streams and divert more contaminated material from landfills. Accurate measurement lets you take action to reduce carbon impact over time, doing your part to tackle climate change and reduce natural resource consumption. Automated reporting helps your clients deliver informative CSR reports to stakeholders and build a cleaner, greener community.

Explore sustainability

How Leading Brands are Reporting on ESG

Quantifying Environmental Progress

See how forward-thinking companies, including Apple, ADT and Planet Fitness, are using Compology waste metering data to quantify their commitment to environmental responsibility and sustainability, tracking progress and presenting results to customers, employees and shareholders alike.

Explore ESG reports

How Leading Brands are Reporting on ESG

Quantifying Environmental Progress

See how forward-thinking companies, including Apple, ADT and Planet Fitness, are using Compology waste metering data to quantify their commitment to environmental responsibility and sustainability, tracking progress and presenting results to customers, employees and shareholders alike.

Explore ESG reports

Technology built for waste & recycling

Our rugged dumpster cameras and AI-powered waste meteringTM technology deliver continuous rightsizing, service verification and contamination reduction.

  • Ultra-rugged, long-lasting dumpster camera
  • Data on dumpster fullness, contamination, content, locations and service events – all tied to customer accounts
  • Intuitive, artificial intelligence-powered software
  • Actionable reporting and notifications for meaningful business insights
Explore waste metering

What leading brokers and consultants say

  • “In the old days when we rightsized, we would have to guess what service to choose for the customer. And that’s where we had problems with overflowing. Now with Compology, we don’t have to guess. We’ve got terrific data history and proof that the service we’re going to recommend can work.“

    ROB RYAN,
    PRESIDENT & CEO, NEW MARKET WASTE

  • “Waste metering is going to become an industry standard across the board.“

    PETER SPANO,
    PRESIDENT AND CEO, GLOBAL TRASH SOLUTIONS

  • “At Waste Consultants, we have seen firsthand the benefit that Compology’s cameras and technology provide to companies that are looking to gain a better understanding of their waste stream. Compology’s waste metering gives us access to critical and actionable data that we did not previously have.“

    TYLER BRUNSON,
    CEO, WASTE CONSULTANTS INC.

  • “Compology is a game changer for our waste stream tracking and for the circular economy! By leveraging state of the art technology through Compology, Smart Waste empowers our customers with contamination AI, missed pickups and more. This means data collection and follow up in real-time!“

    EXECUTIVE TEAM,
    SMART WASTE USA

  • “Partnering with Compology has been a watershed transition in the way we manage and monitor waste operations and sustainability programs. This service has been a significant value add for our customers who are concerned with real-time information and operational efficiency. This technology is a groundbreaking step into the future of waste management.“

    DAVID BAKER,
    OPERATIONS, WASTE NOT CONSULTING

  • “Compology is truly a valued partner to Waste Logic and our customers. Our customers have saved time and money because of their innovative technology. In addition, we’ve been able to grow our business because of the additional value they bring.“

    JEFF BLANEY,
    VP OF OPERATIONS, WASTE LOGIC

  • “Compology helps us provide better service to our customers and save them money at a time when many businesses are working hard to adjust to unprecedented circumstances and uncertain futures.“

    DAN STUDER,
    PERMANENT SERVICES DIVISION NATIONAL SALES MANAGER, ZTERS

article

Fortune 500 Grainger Features Waste Metering Impact in 2021 ESG Report

article

Hear it from Apple: “We were overestimating waste.”

video

Live on CNN: Why McDonald’s restaurants are putting cameras in their dumpsters

Broker & Facilities Services Package

  • Continuous rightsizing, service verification, contamination recognition
  • Camera installation coordination
  • Account configuration and training
  • Dedicated account manager for value recognition coaching and support
  • Educational package for your team and customers

Get a quote
